Name: Dream Golf VR
About the game: Dream Golf VR features TWO full 18 hole mini golf courses, a total of 36 holes, for one to enjoy in VR. The use of vibrant colors and serene landscapes help give the user a pleasant experience. Once the game is started, the player can select a ball color, change the length of their club, and choose from several soundtracks to accompany their game. Each hole features a sign on post that keeps track of the player's score. For even more fun, 3 additional courses are available as DLC! List of game features: Glow Golf - With the flip of a switch, play a night game of glow golf! Arcade Mode - New traps, obstacles, penalties, and rewards await with this game mode. Try it out with 'glow golf' enabled for a new flair! Hard Mode - Up for a more difficult challenge? This mode contains additional holes you want to avoid. Sinking the ball in one of these will add a stroke! Easy Mode - Looking for a very casual experience? The ball gravitates towards the hole when in close proximity! Practice Mode - Play any hole as many times as you like! Local high scores - Keep track of your best games with these high score boards. Steam achievements - Achievements for acing each hole on regular & hard mode. Steam Leaderboards - A variety of Leaderboards have been added for the competitive ones out there! Enjoy!
